Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at  75th/King Drive to Champlain
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses rerouted via 75th, King Dr, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage nr 75th/King Dr to Champlain

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive to Champlain.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Northbound #54 Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Diversey
ShortDescription: Northbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted near Cicero/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Diversey, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Cicero/Diversey.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River, downtown.

Shuttle buses are available between Merchandise Mart and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.
 
Some trains may be held in stations or turned back towards Kimball before reaching the bridge to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Bus shuttle service is available at Merchandise Mart and Clark/Lake. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding. Crews are working to correct the problem to allow us to safely resume service.
 
We apology for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Dept. of Bridge works to complete the bridge lift operation.  Allow extra travel time.
